description: Traits are a key gameplay mechanic in Halls of Torment, providing players with powerful bonuses that can greatly enhance their chances of success by leveling up.

base_traits.description: Base Traits are available from the very start.

fallback_traits.description: These traits appear when the trait pool is fully depleted.

elevated_traits.description: Elevated Traits have to be unlocked through Quests.

ability_traits.description: Ability Traits improve the effectiveness of abilities, possibly at a compromise.
